page.title: 10TREND IN SURNAMES
page.content: On the wall in my great aunt's house there is a scroll signed by all the pupils of my school at Penboyr on 2nd February 1971 commemorating the hundredth birthday of my great grandfather,Esau Evans.He lived most of his life in Goetre Uchaf where I live now.On the scroll most of the surnames are Welsh and there are only five English ones. Today there are forty three surnames which are not Welsh. Here is a table to show the change in the number of pupils with Welsh surnames. {NAMES 1971 1985 Jones 15 14 Davies 9 7 James 8 1 Williams 7 3 Evans 7 0 Thomas 5 2 {MARI ELIN JONES
